title: 000: What is Mind Pump? An Introduction...
description: Sal Di Stefano, Adam Schafer and Justin Andrews are your hosts of MindPump, a show that exposes the RAW TRUTH about fitness, health, building muscle, supplementation and other topics. In this episode, your hosts introduce themselves and their vision for the show.
